sub_title: Communication coordinator (Asian - European cultural bridge builder)
summary:
Experienced in business to business with Chinese, Japanese and Dutch companies. I am fluent in Japanese (mother language), Chinese (Mandarin) and English.

I am a cultural bridge builder between Japanese, Chinese and Western companies, who can help to develop trust in a business relationship.
